title: Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, Unscented, 50 Count
descriptions:
**Keep Your Kitchen Clean and Tidy with Ease!**

Introducing the dependable and easy-to-use Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags – the perfect companion for your kitchen's daily needs. These bags come in a convenient pack of 50, ensuring you have plenty to last you through many days of clean-up.

**Product Features:**

- **Generous Size:** Each bag holds up to 13 gallons, fitting most standard kitchen trash cans comfortably.
- **Tear-Resistant:** Made with Flex-tra strength, our white plastic bags resist tears, making sure your garbage stays in the bag, not on your floor.
- **Easy Closure:** The red drawstring at the top of each bag makes closing and carrying a breeze – no more fumbling with twist ties!
- **Odor-Free:** These bags are unscented, so they won’t clash with the lovely aromas of your home cooking.
- **Simple Shopping:** Reordering is as easy as saying "Alexa, buy Amazon Basics kitchen trash bags," thanks to Alexa voice shopping compatibility.

Our Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags are designed with both strength and simplicity in mind. Whether you’re tossing out coffee grounds, leftovers, or simply tidying up, these bags will ensure a no-fuss disposal every time.

**Easy for Everyone:**

Specially designed for hassle-free use, these trash bags are ideal for anyone who values convenience in their day-to-day kitchen tasks. If you or your loved ones prefer not to deal with complicated products, these trash bags offer an uncomplicated solution to keeping your space neat and orderly.

With the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, you can say goodbye to messy leaks and spills. Keep your kitchen spotless with this essential household helper – order your pack today and experience the ease of a reliable trash bag!

Introducing the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags – the simple, reliable solution to keeping your home tidy and odor-free!

Each box comes with 50 sturdy trash bags, designed to fit most kitchen trash cans with a generous 13-gallon capacity. These bags are unscented, perfect for those who prefer a clean and fresh environment without added fragrances.

Crafted from tear-resistant white plastic, these bags are made to withstand the daily wear and tear of kitchen refuse without easily ripping or leaking. The Flex-tra strength ensures that even the heaviest loads can be handled with confidence.

Closing the bags is a breeze, thanks to the bright red drawstring. Not only does it add a touch of color, but it also provides a secure closure and makes carrying the bag to the curb easy and mess-free.

And for those who have embraced smart technology, you'll be pleased to know that these trash bags are Alexa voice shopping enabled. Simply ask your Alexa device to reorder when you're running low, and you'll never be caught without trash bags again.

The Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags are the no-fuss, strong, and dependable choice for maintaining a clean kitchen. Order yours today and experience the ease of a trash bag that does its job so you can focus on what matters most.
